title: Widen Your Lens Of Perspective | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Widen Your Lens Of Perspective | Victoria Osteen
description:
Don’t let a difficult season keep you from recognizing the good things God is doing in your life. He has new blessings prepared for you today!

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
